Definition.Description: A customer developed a similar analysis to save approximately $1MM/yr in DRA usage over 3 pipelines Problem Statement: DRA injection is pivotal to midstream pipelines to ensure on specification product while reducing operating costs with transporting additional material. While its impact is undeniable, its high cost forces companies to optimize
Definition.Document:
Pipeline Drag Reducing Agent (DRA) Optimization

Problem Statement:

DRA injection is pivotal to midstream pipelines to ensure on specification product while reducing operating costs with transporting additional material. While its impact is undeniable, its high cost forces companies to optimize its usage to focus on problematic segments of their pipelines.

Solution:

DRA Injection Monitoring View

 

Focus on a particular flow regime of interest(3400-4600 m³/h)
(Do it! Step: Perform a Value Search on Flow Rate) 

Determine which segments of a pipeline historically have had the lowest hydraulic room, identifying areas where DRA injection is beneficial
 

Repeat the previous step, but this time aimed at segments where DRA injection can be reduced
 

Calculate potential opportunity costs associated with optimizing DRA injection
(Imagine! integrating with other data sets like Energy Consumption and Fluid Properties)
 

Develop monitoring views to detect inefficient DRA injection at scale
